name: WEAPON MASTER (HenkFan)
description: Weapon Master is a game that aims to provide juicy and blood-pumping shooting experiences for players. It is a two-week solo project in NYU's Intro to Game-engines class.  During the gameplay, players will have sixty seconds to beat up hordes of monsters in the world while cycling through four unique weapons. Compared to other top-down shooters, players in Weapon Master do not have a classic health bar but will lose seconds if hit by the monsters, enhancing the core ticking-clock mechanic of this six-seconds game. Will you be the one that collects hundreds of gold and coins? Have a try with your friends and see who collects the most amount of coins!
